r1.name: Glacial Fissure
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Braum''' leaps into the air and slams his shield into the ground, creating a fissure that travels in the target direction, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies within its path as well as those around '''Braum'''.

The first target hit is {{tip|airborne|knocked up}} for at least {{fd|0.3}} seconds, increased if they are further away from '''Braum'''. All other enemies hit are {{tip|airborne|knocked up}} for {{fd|0.3}} seconds.

A field of ice is created along the fissure's path, lasting for 4 seconds and {{tip|slow|slowing}} enemies within the area every {{fd|0.25}} seconds. The field disappears after the duration ends in the same order and speed it was created with.
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Braum leaps into the air and slams his shield into the ground, creating a fissure that travels in the target direction, dealing magic damage to enemies within its path as well as those around Braum.
The first target hit is knocked up for at least 0.3 seconds, increased if they are further away from Braum. All other enemies hit are knocked up for 0.3 seconds.
A field of ice is created along the fissure's path, lasting for 4 seconds and slowing enemies within the area every 0.25 seconds. The field disappears after the duration ends in the same order and speed it was created with.

q1.name: Winter's Bite
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Braum''' propels ice from his shield in the target direction, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to the first enemy hit and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 70% decaying over 2 seconds.
q1.descriptionHtml: Active: Braum propels ice from his shield in the target direction, dealing magic damage to the first enemy hit and slowing them by 70% decaying over 2 seconds.
q1.notes: * ''Winter's Bite'' will cast from wherever '''Braum''' is at the end of the cast time.

effects.str: • Magic Damage: (+ 2.5% of Braum's maximum health)

e1.name: Unbreakable
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Braum''' sets his shield in the target direction for a few seconds, creating a barrier that intercepts all incoming hostile non-{{tip|turret}} {{tip|projectiles}} and {{tip|Damage reduction|reduces}} the [[damage]] '''Braum''' takes through the shield. The first instance of damage blocked by his shield is negated completely.
While his shield is raised, '''Braum''' also gains {{sti|ms|{{as|10% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} and {{tip|ghosting}}.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Braum sets his shield in the target direction for a few seconds, creating a barrier that intercepts all incoming hostile non-turret projectiles and reduces the damage Braum takes through the shield. The first instance of damage blocked by his shield is negated completely.
While his shield is raised, Braum also gains 10% bonus movement speed and ghosting.
e1.notes:
* {{sbc|Definitions}}
** {{sbc|Incoming:}} Damage sources coming from somewhere facing the shield. Those coming from different sides are not affected.
** {{sbc|Projectiles:}} Sped up entities not classified as a unit ({{tip|champions}}, {{tip|minions}}, {{tip|monsters}}, etc.)
** {{sbc|Intercepting:}} A projectile hitting '''Braum''' because he is standing in front of the intended target. In addition to being redirected, an intercepted projectile is also destroyed '''after''' hitting '''Braum''' (although this is only applicable to pass-through projectiles).
* Moving units are not intercepted under any circumstance, including {{tip|dash|dashes}}. [[Champion summoned units]] are not classified as units until they hit the ground (e.g. {{ai|Sapling Toss|Maokai}}) and thus will interact with ''Unbreakable'' whilst en route.
* Projectiles whose effects trigger on collision will still trigger - dealing damage, applying [[debuff]]s, creating area of effects and marking the target as 'hit'.
* Abilities that deal [[area of effect]] damage on-collision will only damage '''Braum'''.
* If {{ai|Spinning Axe|Draven}} hits '''Braum''', regardless of if its the first hit on the damage reduction or not, it will '''always''' bounce back and not be destroyed. This happens even if '''Braum''' intercepts the attack for an ally though the axe will bounce back from '''Braum''' and not the intended target.
* Projectile-based [[ground-targeted]] abilities that only occur upon successfully hitting the ground ({{ai|Miasma|Cassiopeia}}, {{ai|Aqua Prison|Nami}}, etc.) will apply their full effects to '''Braum''' but will be destroyed without affecting any other ally.
* Projectiles that '''cannot''' hit '''Braum''' or his allies (such as an enemy {{ai|Prismatic Barrier|Lux}}) will not be intercepted.<ref>[http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=4464736&page=2#post46663454 Unbreakable's interaction with Lux's Prismatic Barrier]</ref>
** {{cais|Starcall|Soraka}} ''Rejuvenation'' projectile is however blocked.
* The '''damage reduction''' will affect any source of damage whose origin is in front of the shield. This includes:
** All intercepted projectiles.
** {{tip|Melee}} and non-projectile-based {{tip|ranged}} attacks.
** Instantaneous [[direction-targeted]] abilities (e.g. {{ai|Arcanopulse|Xerath}}, {{ai|Final Spark|Lux}}, {{ai|Lifeform Disintegration Ray|Vel'Koz}}.)
** Instantaneously-placed [[ground-targeted]] abilities (e.g. {{ai|Lay Waste|Karthus}}, {{ai|Pillar of Flame|Brand}}, {{ai|Rupture|Cho'Gath}}) relative to the ability's center and '''not''' the caster's.
** Point-blank area-of-effects (e.g. {{ai|Ground Slam|Malphite}}, {{ai|Tantrum|Amumu}}, {{ai|Time Bomb|Zilean}} ''not'' targeted at '''Braum''')
** Instantaneous targeted abilities (e.g. {{ai|Malefic Visions|Malzahar}}, {{ai|Transfusion|Vladimir}}, {{ai|Time Bomb|Zilean}} targeted at '''Braum''') and {{tip|AoE DoT}} (e.g. {{ai|Spirit Fire|Nasus}}, {{ai|Tormented Shadow|Morgana}}, {{ai|Poison Trail|Singed}}).
* The damage reduction only benefits '''Braum'''.
** If {{ai|Audacious Charge|Xin Zhao}} would path {{ci|Xin Zhao}} through ''Unbreakable'', only '''Braum''' will take reduced damage.
* {{tip|Damage over time}} is calculated per tick but the full damage reduction will still only apply to a single tick.
* If the damage mitigated by ''Unbreakable'' exceeds a minimum threshold it is represented with floating text similar to the damage mitigated by shields ('{{sbc|-X}}')
** This floating text is always shown for the single fully-reduced damage source.
* For the purposes of abilities like {{ai|Backstab|Shaco}}, '''Braum's''' facing direction is the direction he's moving in (''not the direction his face or the shield are looking in'').
** This is a documented game engine limitation.
* If '''Braum''' is protected by a {{tip|spell shield}}, both it and the one-time-use full damage reduction can be consumed by a single blockable spell.
** The one-time-use full damage reduction will not be consumed if the damage source is nothing but {{tip|true damage}}.
* ''Unbreakable'' will grant [[assist]] credit if the enemy whose projectile is blocked from is killed within 10 seconds.
<!-- {{Pending for test}}: First full damage reduction applies to all hit or only single hit instead if from instantaneous multi-hit instances attack (Graves basic attack has chance two apply two hits?) or spells (Renekton W, Swain Q, Ashe Q).  -->
e1.cooldown_warn: Wiki's and Riot's cooldowns do not match: Wiki's value '{{tt|{{ap|16 to 8}}|Starts post-effect}}' as '0/13.333/10.667/8/5.333/0' and riot's value '16,14,12,10,8' as '16/14/12/10/8'

i1.name: Concussive Blows
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Braum's''' [[basic attack]]s and {{ai|Winter's Bite|Braum}} each apply a ''Concussive Blows'' stack to their target for 4 seconds, stacking up to 4 times, refreshing with each application. Once the first stack has been applied, any allied [[champion|champion's]] basic attack {{tip|on-hit}} applies an additional stack to the target.

Upon reaching 4 stacks on a target, ''Concussive Blows'' is consumed to deal {{as|{{pp|26 to 196}}|magic damage}} {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|stun}} them for {{pp|changedisplay=true|1.25 to 1.75 for 3|1 to 13}} seconds.

This effect cannot apply to the same target more than once every few seconds. During this immunity period, affected targets take{{ft|20% of the trigger damage as {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}|{{as|{{pp|5.2 to 39.2}} '''bonus''' magic damage}}}}from '''Braum's''' basic attacks.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Braum's basic attacks and Winter's Bite each apply a Concussive Blows stack to their target for 4 seconds, stacking up to 4 times, refreshing with each application. Once the first stack has been applied, any allied champion basic attack on-hit applies an additional stack to the target.
Upon reaching 4 stacks on a target, Concussive Blows is consumed to deal 26undefined − 196undefined (based on level) magic damage and stun them for 1 to 13 ‒ undefined seconds.
This effect cannot apply to the same target more than once every few seconds. During this immunity period, affected targets takefrom Braum's basic attacks.
i1.notes:
* ''Concussive Blows'' won't be applied if the attack is {{tip|dodge|dodged}} or {{tip|block|blocked}}.
** {{Pending for test}}: ''Concussive Blows' '' application via basic attack interaction with {{tip|blind}}.

w1.name: Stand Behind Me
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Braum''' {{tip|dashes}} to put himself {{tt|between|150 units from his ally towards the closest enemy}} the target ally and the closest {{tip|sight|visible}} enemy {{tip|champion}} {{tt|within 1500 units|from the ally's location}}, and upon arrival grants himself and the ally {{sti|armor|{{as|'''bonus''' armor}}}} and {{sti|mr|{{as|'''bonus''' magic resistance}}}} for 3 seconds.
''Stand Behind Me'' can be [[Self-targeted|self cast]] to instantly grant '''Braum''' the '''bonus''' resistances.
w1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Braum dashes to put himself between the target ally and the closest visible enemy champion within 1500 units, and upon arrival grants himself and the ally bonus armor and bonus magic resistance for 3 seconds.
Stand Behind Me can be Self-targeted to instantly grant Braum the bonus resistances.
Unbreakable can be cast while dashing.
leveling:
{{st|Self Bonus Armor|{{ap|10 to 26}} {{as|(+ 36% '''bonus''' armor)}}|Self Bonus MR|{{ap|10 to 26}} {{as|(+ 36% '''bonus''' magic resistance)}}}}
{{st|Ally Bonus Armor|{{ap|10 to 26}} {{as|(+ 12% '''bonus''' armor)}}|Ally Bonus MR|{{ap|10 to 26}} {{as|(+ 12% '''bonus''' magic resistance)}}}}
w1.notes:
* ''Stand Behind Me'' can also be used on allied {{tip|minions}}, but cannot be used on {{tip|ward|wards}}.
* If there are no nearby enemy champions, '''Braum''' will dash to land up-to 150 units on the far side of his target.
* The maximum dash range without enemy champions present is ~650. An enemy champion on the far side of the ally will allow '''Braum''' to dash a total of up-to 800 units.
* If the {{tip|dash}} is interrupted, neither '''Braum''' not his ally receive the bonus resistances.

effects.str:
• Self Bonus Armor: (+ 36% bonus armor)
  • Self Bonus MR: (+ 36% bonus magic resistance)

  • Ally Bonus Armor: (+ 12% bonus armor)
  • Ally Bonus MR: (+ 12% bonus magic resistance)
